entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Cambridge Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:26 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -26.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cambridge Bay Airport 12:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -26.2°C
Pressure: 102.0 kPa
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -41
Dewpoint: -29.5°C
Wind: NNW 34 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 38 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 41 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 29.
